mapper.select: SELECT ANN_NUM , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ANN_WRITER , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ANN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANN_DATE FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN.ANN_CATE = LIST.CATE_CODE ORDER BY ANN_NUM DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 7 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME FROM ANN_CATE_LIST ORDER BY CATE_CODE

SELECT COUNT(ANN_NUM) FROM ANNOUNCEMENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND ANN_CATE = #{annCate}

SELECT ANN_NUM , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ANN_WRITER , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(ANN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANN_DATE FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN.ANN_CATE = LIST.CATE_CODE AND ANN_NUM = #{annNum}

SELECT QNA_CODE , QNA.CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , QNA_QUESTION , QNA_ANSWER FROM QNA QNA, QNA_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE QNA.CATE_CODE = LIST.CATE_CODE ORDER BY QNA_CODE DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 7 ROWS ONLY

SELECT QNA_CODE , QNA.CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , QNA_QUESTION , QNA_ANSWER FROM QNA QNA, QNA_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE QNA.CATE_CODE = LIST.CATE_CODE ORDER BY QNA_CODE DESC OFFSET (#{nowPage} -1) * #{displayDataCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayDataCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT INQ_CODE , INQ.CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , MEMBER_ID , TITLE , IS_RESPONSE , TO_CHAR(INQ_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INQ_DATE FROM INQUIRE INQ, INQ_CATE_LIST CATE WHERE INQ.CATE_CODE = CATE.CATE_CODE ORDER BY INQ_CODE DESC OFFSET (#{nowPage} -1) * #{displayDataCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayDataCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT INQ_CODE , INQ.CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , MEMBER_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(INQ_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INQ_DATE , IS_RESPONSE FROM INQUIRE INQ, INQ_CATE_LIST CATE WHERE INQ.CATE_CODE = CATE.CATE_CODE AND INQ_CODE = #{inqCode}

SELECT ANN_CATE , CATE_NAME , ANN_WRITER , ANN_TITLE , ANN_CONTENT FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ANN, ANN_CATE_LIST LIST WHERE ANN_CATE = CATE_CODE
AND UPPER(ANN_CATE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchData})||'%'
AND UPPER(CATE_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchData})||'%'
AND UPPER(ANN_WRITER) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchData})||'%'
AND UPPER(ANN_TITLE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchData})||'%'
AND UPPER(ANN_CONTENT) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchData})||'%'
